Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Complete Project Manager application with Gantt charts

Full-featured project management application with:
- Interactive DHTMLX Gantt chart with drag-and-drop
- Task dependencies (4 types: FS, SS, FF, SF)
- File uploads and attachments
- Comments and activity tracking
- Team collaboration with 4 role levels
- Export to Excel, CSV, and PDF
- JWT authentication with refresh tokens
- Docker containerization ready
- Complete testing suite (Jest + Vitest)
- CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions

Tech stack: React + TypeScript + Vite, Node.js + Express, PostgreSQL 15
